title: The Collected Buffy (Classic) (+60 Variants) (DH|1998-2003|Dgtl)
description:
Overview:  <a href=" http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Buffyverse_comics" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Buffyverse_comics</a>

           <a href=" http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Buffy_the_Vampire_Slayer_comics" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Buffy_the_Vampire_Slayer_comics</a>


Contains:

   61 volumes of "Buffy" comics, compiled per narrative continuity from the Empire
   and Minutemen releases of the 49 volumes of "Buffy the Vampire Slayer Classic",
   published in 2011-2012 by Dark Horse, bookended with cover galleries containing
   about 60 variants not included in those original volumes, obtained from
   disassembling the "Panel to Panel" artbook, published in 2007 by Dark Horse.

   The "Classic" volumes, in turn, re-print the following, published in 1998-2003:

    - "Buffy the Vampire Slayer" issues 1 thru 63, plus the "Annual 1999" special,

    - 8 miniseries (with typically 3 issues each) and 8 special issues and graphic
      novels, published separately over that same period,

    - and 16 short stories, stemming either from yet more "Buffy" specials,
      published by Dark Horse and Wizard, or from generic Dark Horse anthologies.

   The 60 additional covers include every single one of those of the 63 regular
   issues (except when already re-purposed for one of the "Classic" volumes),
   and something like three quarters of those belonging to the miniseries issues.
